addS5TIME

public void addS5TIME(long value)
add a PLC S5TIME value in long format (milliseconds) to the buffer

Parameters:
value - a Datetime value in the range 10 to 9999000 (in milliseconds) if Value not between 10ms and 9999000ms, the values ​​are set to 0 or 9999000ms, depending on whether the value is less than or greater
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Boolean values can’t transfer with other data types!

addS7String

public void addS7String(java.lang.String value)
add a S7-string value to the writebuffer
an S7 string includes maximum length and current length in the first two bytes

Parameters:
value - a string value
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Boolean values can’t transfer with other data types!
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - S7-Strings values can’t transfer with other data!
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the maximum string length of 254 characters was exceeded

addS7String

public void addS7String(java.lang.String value,
                        java.lang.String CharsetName,
                        boolean FallBackToCurrentCodepage)
add a S7-string value to the writebuffer
an S7 string includes maximum length and current length in the first two bytes

Parameters:
value - a string value
CharsetName - the charset name of the spec. encoding
FallBackToCurrentCodepage - when set in the case of an error the current charset will be used
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Boolean values can’t transfer with other data types!
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - S7-Strings values can’t transfer with other data!
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the maximum string length of 254 characters was exceeded
